content.text: Match ends, Lyon 0, Juventus 1.
Second Half ends, Lyon 0, Juventus 1.
Attempt missed. Rachid Ghezzal (Lyon) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Maxime Gonalons.
Attempt saved. Gonzalo Higuaín (Juventus) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Juan Cuadrado.
Jérémy Morel (Lyon) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Juan Cuadrado (Juventus).
Foul by Nicolas Nkoulou (Lyon).
Gonzalo Higuaín (Juventus) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt saved. Maxime Gonalons (Lyon) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Corentin Tolisso.
Attempt blocked. Corentin Tolisso (Lyon) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Nabil Fekir with a cross.
Corner,  Lyon. Conceded by Medhi Benatia.
Attempt blocked. Rachid Ghezzal (Lyon) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Corentin Tolisso.

Goal!  Lyon 0, Juventus 1. Juan Cuadrado (Juventus) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Dani Alves.
Substitution, Juventus. Stefano Sturaro replaces Sami Khedira.
